name: Armory
description: A fortified site for soldiers and defense; adventurers could obtain contracts, enlist aid, or break in to free captives.
atmosphere: The air carries the sharp scent of oiled steel and the metallic tang of weapons. Rows of gleaming armor and deadly weapons line the walls, while the sound of metal being tested and sharpened fills the air. Guards stand at attention, their eyes watchful and their hands never far from their weapons.
